title: I am color blind
body:
Hi everyone. I wanted to tell i have some problems with skins in games as a color blind person. 
First of all i cant tell difference for Caityln passive up or not. ( Pulsefire Cait skin ). Next i notice new honor wards for lvl 3 and lvl 4 for me are same color. Sometimes i have trouble with Cait traps to see. 
Do anyone have some solution for this problem, maybe some color adj on minior or something?   


Thank you for answer.

replies.body: You should be able to access colorblind mode through the in-game options! Turn that on and try it out with Caitlyn in a custom/practice match really quick for me.
